name: cs260-startup
description: Dungeons and Dragons is rapidly becoming the most popular tabletop role-playing game in America. With incredibly high production DnD podcasts and tv shows becoming more and more common, peoples' standards are becoming higher. Sound effects and awesome music elevate the experience ten-fold. You and all your friends need a way to have a shared soundboard you can pull up on your phone to use during all of your DnD sessions.
